original_title: In Sheep's Clothing: The Ryan Guevara Story
overview: In Sheep's Clothing chronicles the friendship of Ryan Guevara and Jake Winter, the foundation of Bush Wagon Productions, and Ryan's slippery descent into the unknown horrors of life after he's attacked by a mysterious force.
tagline: Love, Friendship, and Pure, Unadulterated Terror
title: In Sheep's Clothing: The Ryan Guevara Story
